snippet.title: Fort Triumph | Official Update Trailer 2019 | (PC)
snippet.description:
Fort Triumph gets buffed today! Watch the trailer and see what’s new in this challenging and fun fantasy turn-based tactics game! Lead a band of heroes through tiled procedural maps with interactive environments, dealing with dangers and facing the risk of sudden permadeath at any moment. The new update involves a visual overhaul of the forest and village environments, new UI and backgrounds for all four faction capitals, significant performance improvements and indoor combat. 
Available now on Steam: http://bit.ly/2l5W5WS

Follow on social media:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/FortTriumph
Twitter: https://twitter.com/FortTriumph

Follow All in! Games:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/allingamespub
Twitter: https://twitter.com/allingamespub
